text: ninsanka tamara mate sikha hati te banne juthomam je bhali gaya hata, eka jutha to allaha ta'alana margamam ladi rahyum hatum ane bijum jutha inkari'onum hatum, te te'one potani ankho vade potanathi bamana jo'i rahya hata ane allaha ta'ala jene icche potani madada vade majabuta kare che, ninsanka amam ankhovala mate moti sikha che
